name: Procedural Quest Generation in a Turn-Based environment
name_original: Procedural Quest Generation in a Turn-Based environment
description:
This project is a small experiment on procedural generation, with procedural tiled maps, quest generation with multiple objectives, AI-based algorithm to position enemies in the most favorable positions and working turn-based strategy combat to test it out.

FEATURING: Random map generator with easily modifiable parameters Modular addition of objectives Custom player unit configuration, procedural enemy creation Playable turn-based strategy combat in the recently created environment.

For more details on the features and work on this subject, feel free to check out my portfolio webpage
